sentences.html: 360 Threat Intelligence Center

sentences.text: Function Introduction 360 Threat Intelligence Center is the world's leading threat intelligence sharing, analysis and early warning platform. Relying on 360 security brain tens of billions of samples, trillions of protection logs and other massive security data, it integrates 360 vulnerability mining, malicious code analysis, and threat intelligence tracking. and other security capabilities of the team, produce high-quality security threat intelligence, and drive security defense, detection, and response.

chapters.title: APT-C-53 (Gamaredon) New Round DDoS Attack Mission Analysis

sentences.text: Recently, 360 Security Brain has detected more frequent network attacks related to the APT-C-53 (Gamaredon) organization, and found that the organization began to release the open source DDoS Trojan program " LOIC " to carry out DDoS attacks.
sentences.html: Recently, 360 Security Brain has detected more frequent network attacks related to the APT-C-53 (Gamaredon) organization, and found that the organization began to release the open source DDoS Trojan program " LOIC " to carry out DDoS attacks.

sentences.text: in the rightDuring the monitoring of APT-C-53 (Gamaredon) network attacks , we found multiple attack chains: phishing emails, file remote template injection execution, S FX self-extracting program execution of malicious scripts, Wiper malware delivery, And registry write load schedule task execution and so on.
sentences.html: in the rightDuring the monitoring of APT-C-53 (Gamaredon) network attacks , we found multiple attack chains: phishing emails, file remote template injection execution, S FX self-extracting program execution of malicious scripts, Wiper malware delivery, And registry write load schedule task execution and so on.

sentences.text: Through continuous mining, we have captured the<crlf>network attack activities of multiple APT-C-53 (Gamaredon) organizations<crlf>, and found related samples and C 2 servers . During the monitoring process of this batch of C 2 servers ,<crlf>We<crlf>found that multiple C2<crlf>servers distributed an open source<crlf>D Dos Trojan program L OIC compiled by .net from March 4th<crlf>to 5th, 2022 .
sentences.html:
Through continuous mining, we have captured the 
network attack activities of multiple APT-C-53 (Gamaredon) organizations 
, and found related samples and C 2 servers . During the monitoring process of this batch of C 2 servers ,
We 
found that multiple C2 
servers distributed an open source 
D Dos Trojan program L OIC compiled by .net from March 4th 
to 5th, 2022 .

sentences.text: DDoS software is run by VBS script and Powershell script, and L OIC is the open source software of Git Hub . ( https://github.com/NewEraCracker/LOIC)

sentences.text: Summarize<crlf>This time , we observed the recent D DoS attack intentions of APT-C-53 (Gamaredon) through the vision of 360 Security<crlf>Brain<crlf>for the first time .<crlf>The distribution of the L OIC Trojan may be the prelude to a new round of D DoS attacks .
sentences.html:
Summarize
This time , we observed the recent D DoS attack intentions of APT-C-53 (Gamaredon) through the vision of 360 Security 
Brain 
for the first time . 
The distribution of the L OIC Trojan may be the prelude to a new round of D DoS attacks .

sentences.text: 360 Advanced Threat Research Institute is the core capability support department of 360 Government and Enterprise Security Group. It is composed of 360 senior security experts and focuses on the discovery, defense, disposal and research of advanced threats. It has taken the lead in capturing double kills, double stars and nightmares on a global scale. Formula and many other well-known 0-day in-the-field attacks, exclusively disclosed the advanced actions of multiple national-level APT organizations, and won wide recognition both inside and outside the industry, providing strong support for 360 to ensure national network security.
sentences.html: 360 Advanced Threat Research Institute is the core capability support department of 360 Government and Enterprise Security Group. It is composed of 360 senior security experts and focuses on the discovery, defense, disposal and research of advanced threats. It has taken the lead in capturing double kills, double stars and nightmares on a global scale. Formula and many other well-known 0-day in-the-field attacks, exclusively disclosed the advanced actions of multiple national-level APT organizations, and won wide recognition both inside and outside the industry, providing strong support for 360 to ensure national network security.
